channel.title: Error?
channel.description:
Im having this error in adding floating text , can anybody tell me whats wrong?
[code]RSInterface.java:2448: error: method addHoverText in class RSInterface cannot be applied to given types; addHoverText(29162, "Co-Owner: Test", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); ^ required: int,String,String,RSFont[],int,int,boolean,boolean,int found: int,String,RSFont[],int,int,boolean,boolean,int reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Oh, opps sorry I didn’t release

item.title: Error?

item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Saige, post:5, topic:445119”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=547807.msg4016611#msg4016611 date=1339695929]
you have too many parameters, or you’re missing one.

P.S wrong section, this is server help, not client
[/quote]

FAIL it’s the client section lol…[/quote]
It was moved because you posted In the wrong section. If you want help, dont flame the people trying to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

addHoverText(29162, "Co-Owner: Test", "Co-Owner: Test" TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);

try that.

You missed the actual hover part.
